aka: Wan Maa Hon Tee Kaai Look Seuua

cast.name: 蒂蒂卡亚·奇瓦普雷佐 Thitichaya Chiwpreecha
彭萨帕特·坎卡姆 Pongsapat Kankam
图查蓬·库旺博迪特 Thuchapon Koowongbundit

this_title: วันหมาหอนที่ค่ายลูกเสือ
trans_title: Wan Maa Hon Tee Kaai Look Seuua
introduction: Wanting to increase their channel views, a group of teenage Youtubers set out on a camping trip to the haunted Rayong province. Each of them starts to experience weird occurrences and they all perish in the incident under mysterious circumstances. In hopes of solving the case, the authority goes through the footage that the group has filmed and discovers an entity known as the White Brother ghost lurking within.
foreign_title: วันหมาหอนที่ค่ายลูกเสือ
